body_html:
@wt-huang The system is throwing an error The array of length xxxx cannot be wrapped into tensor of length 3072 if size of the array is anything else but 3072.

I have grep'ed the error result and found out it was in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/reshape_op.h line 78

OP_REQUIRES(context, shape.num_elements() == input.NumElements(),
                errors::InvalidArgument("Input to reshape is a tensor with ",
                                        input.NumElements(),
                                        " values, but the requested shape has ",
                                        shape.num_elements()));

@wt-huang The system is throwing an error The array of length xxxx cannot be wrapped into tensor of length 3072 if size of the array is anything else but 3072.
I have grep'ed the error result and found out it was in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/reshape_op.h line 78
OP_REQUIRES(context, shape.num_elements() == input.NumElements(),
                errors::InvalidArgument("Input to reshape is a tensor with ",
                                        input.NumElements(),
                                        " values, but the requested shape has ",
                                        shape.num_elements()));
body:
@wt-huang The system is throwing an error ```The array of length xxxx cannot be wrapped into tensor of length 3072``` if size of the array is anything else but 3072.

I have grep'ed the error result and found out it was in [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/reshape_op.h](url) line 78

```
OP_REQUIRES(context, shape.num_elements() == input.NumElements(),
                errors::InvalidArgument("Input to reshape is a tensor with ",
                                        input.NumElements(),
                                        " values, but the requested shape has ",
                                        shape.num_elements()));
```
